howItWorks.subTitle: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Here How It Works
howItWorks.shortDescription: You’re busy, so we’ll make this easy. Timo is constantly growing just like the possibilities of what you can achieve.

steps.title: Step - 01
steps.text: Open an account and select an artboard for creating a 3d art. You can select from the ready template for your first work.

steps.title: Step - 02
steps.text: Follow the instruction and watch all youtube video to get a clear idea about Timo and start your first 3d design project.

steps.title: Step - 03
steps.text: Save file in web and export in your desired format. In your free trial you can only get the png file of your design.
